dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.
dependencies.name: pil

dependencies.description:
The Astropy Project is a community effort to develop a single core
package for Astronomy in Python and foster interoperability between
Python astronomy packages.
dependencies.name: py-astropy

dependencies.description:
Beautiful Soup is a Python library for pulling data out of HTML and XML
files. It works with your favorite parser to provide idiomatic ways of
navigating, searching, and modifying the parse tree.
dependencies.name: py-beautifulsoup4

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description:
The aim of the decorator module it to simplify the usage of decorators
for the average programmer, and to popularize decorators by showing
various non-trivial examples.
dependencies.name: py-decorator

dependencies.description:
emcee is an MIT licensed pure-Python implementation of Goodman & Weare's
Affine Invariant Markov chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) Ensemble sampler.
dependencies.name: py-emcee

dependencies.description:
The h5py package provides both a high- and low-level interface to the
HDF5 library from Python.
dependencies.name: py-h5py

dependencies.description:
Jinja2 is a template engine written in pure Python. It provides a Django
inspired non-XML syntax but supports inline expressions and an optional
sandboxed environment.
dependencies.name: py-jinja2

dependencies.description: Representations of semi-open intervals.
dependencies.name: py-ligo-segments

dependencies.description:
Glue (Grid LSC User Environment) is a suite of python modules and
programs to allow users to run LSC codes on the grid. It also provides
certain metadata services, such as the LSC segment database.
dependencies.name: py-lscsoft-glue

dependencies.description:
A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the
existing templating languages.
dependencies.name: py-mako

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description:
An interactive D3js-based viewer which brings matplotlib graphics to the
browser.
dependencies.name: py-mpld3

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.
dependencies.name: py-six

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
PyCBC is a software package used to explore astrophysical sources of
gravitational waves. It contains algorithms to analyze gravitational-
wave data from the LIGO and Virgo detectors, detect coalescing compact
binaries, and measure the astrophysical parameters of detected sources.
PyCBC was used in the first direct detection of gravitational waves and
is used in the flagship analysis of LIGO and Virgo data.
name: py-pycbc

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
